mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (user_key, cafe_id, reservation_pickup_time, reservation_create_dt) VALUES (#{userKey}, #{cafeId}, #{pickupDateTime}, NOW())
INSERT INTO reservation_menu (reservation_id, menu_id, reservation_menu_quantity) VALUES (LAST_INSERT_ID(), #{menuId}, #{reservationMenuQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT r.reservation_id, u.user_realname, c.cafe_name, r.reservation_pickup_time, m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_price, m.menu_picture_generated, rm.reservation_menu_quantity FROM reservation r JOIN users u ON r.user_key = u.user_key JOIN cafe c ON r.cafe_id = c.cafe_id LEFT JOIN reservation_menu rm ON r.reservation_id = rm.reservation_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE r.reservation_id = #{reservationId}

SELECT r.reservation_id, u.user_realname, c.cafe_name, r.reservation_pickup_time, m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.menu_price, rm.reservation_menu_quantity, m.menu_picture_generated FROM reservation r JOIN users u ON r.user_key = u.user_key JOIN cafe c ON r.cafe_id = c.cafe_id LEFT JOIN reservation_menu rm ON r.reservation_id = rm.reservation_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON rm.menu_id = m.menu_id WHERE r.user_key = #{userKey} ORDER BY r.reservation_pickup_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
